text: Ia nan akar kamɨn gɨrara mangasa kɨ akar gavgavim ia ganɨdir puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ia mɨgei, gumazamizir igharaziba ingangarir kam damuasa naviba me dɨkafi. Eghtɨ ia damuamin arazir manatamɨn, kɨ dar ganɨva da tuisɨgh deragh dagh fogham, ia igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim a guizbangɨrama otifi, o puvatɨ?
